name: Solgaleo Prism Star
author: Shin Nagasawa
flavor_text: This Pokémon is said to be a male evolution of Cosmog. At the activation of its third eye, it departs for another world.

attacks.name: Radiant Star
attacks.effect: For each of your opponent’s Pokémon in play, attach a {M} Energy card from your discard pile to your Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Corona Impact
attacks.effect: This Pokémon can’t attack during your next turn.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
